<!-- @generated by usage-cli from usage spec -->
# `morphir tool update`

- **Usage**: `morphir tool update [-v --version <VERSION>] <NAME>`

Update an installed Morphir tool

## Arguments

### `<NAME>`

Name of the tool to update

## Flags

### `-v --version <VERSION>`

Version to update to (defaults to latest)
